mapper.select: SELECT permission_key AS permission FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role_rel ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN t_role_permission_rel rp ON r.id = rp.role_id AND r.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN t_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.is_deleted = 0 WHERE p.is_deleted = 0 AND u.phone = #{phone}
